createAccount.signUp: Sign up for a free account below or
createAccount.avatarUnique: This avatar is unique, you can’t change it later.

noBackupNoMoney.title: No backup, no money
noBackupNoMoney.description: Now you must to save secret phrase. It is really important for access to your account.

modal.title: Screenshots are not secure
modal.description: If you take a screenshot, your backup may be viewed by other apps.

backupSeed.warn: Since only you control your money, you’ll need to save your backup phrase in case this app is deleted or
backupSeed.writeSeed: Please carefully write down this 15 words
backupSeed.needConfirm: You will to confirm this phrase on the next screen.

confirmBackup.description: Let’s verify your backup phrase or
confirmBackup.enterCorrect: Please, tap each word in the correct order
